name: MCP Legends: Space Hostis
description:
What should i put in the description?

This is a short game made in RPG Maker MV thats all about defeating the evil guy, "Hostis". Thats good? No? It have to be more dramatic? Okay then, how about this!?

Experience an all new World in MCP Legends: Space Hostis! Befriend people to make them join your party!
Journey through the world to get a role in the MCP Universe!

Thats good? No again? Ok, fine.

 I made it in RPG Maker MV,  but, dont expect too much out of it. The plot of the game starts with you in a forest, then you befriend two people, James and Piper, to find the Space Amulet for the MCP Central. Then you meet a fairy that helps you a bit, i guess? Anyways, the biggest problem is that the fairy need a blueberry and you dont know where it is. (Not Actually) Okay thats it so i guess i have to say goodbye or as i say, Poyo!

thats a good description.

-Pal from moldy pie studios
